content.body: Does anyone know if the WebAssembly/wabt repo maintainers have any plans to add arm64 Linux releases? I opened an issue about a month ago but it hasn't gotten a response https://github.com/WebAssembly/wabt/issues/2533
akaster: TC39 isn't really involved in wasm. you might try their discord or something? https://webassembly.org/community/resources/
content.formatted_body: akaster: TC39 isn't really involved in wasm. you might try their discord or something? https://webassembly.org/community/resources/

content.body: ah, I had previously been in a matrix channel for them, but it seemed quite dead. thanks for the link!
